title: I fucking love League of Legends
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/43c3dc70fe0517a190b0ad1fc0c5d132.png

I'm usually above the baby raging and the tear-shedding that goes on in these boards, so I find this shit hilarious.

I can't even imagine how bad you guys are gonna freak out when this comes to pass.

replies.body: Can't wait to see how Kayle's ult manages to be more toxic than Akali's W.
It's the same ult with a mana cost. Unless he lied on Reddit

I'm pretty sure it's nearly the same ult with a mana cost. But August memes a lot so who knows

So anyways, anything new = toxic and should not be in the game in this internet website
